TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawItemEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DrawItem`引發擁有者繪製控制項，例如和控制項。The `DrawItem` event is raised by owner draw controls, such as the and controls. 它包含所有所需的資訊來繪製指定的項目，包括項目索引，使用者，而上應該執行繪圖。It contains all the information that is needed for the user to paint the specified item, including the item index, the , and the on which the drawing should be done. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立主控描繪項目。The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 程式碼會使用屬性，指定繪製的項目固定的大小和事件以執行每個項目至繪圖。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 這個範例假設控制項名為`listBox1`已新增至表單，而且事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。This example assumes that a control that is named `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 此範例也會假設項目已加入至以 「 Apple 」、 「 橙色 」，和"梅紅"文字的順序。The example also assumes that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order. [!code-csharp[ListBox.DrawMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.DrawMode/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.DrawMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.DrawMode/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果項目的狀態為、設。If the item's state is , the is set to . 如果不是項目的狀態、屬性設定為。If the item's state is not , the property is set to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表會幫助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案，名稱為`ListBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type that is named `ListBox1`. 請確定事件處理常式都與事件。Then make sure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立主控描繪項目。The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 程式碼會使用屬性，指定繪製的項目固定的大小和事件以執行每個項目至繪圖。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 這個範例假設控制項名為`listBox1`已新增至表單，而且事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。This example assumes that a control that is named `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code. 此範例也會假設項目已加入至以 「 Apple 」、 「 橙色 」，和"梅紅"文字的順序。The example also assumes that items have been added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order. summary.span: 在 建構函式 (Constructor) 中指定的界限內繪製背景，並使用適當的色彩。

span.span: Draws the background within the bounds specified in the constructor and with the appropriate color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果項目所繪製，以反白顯示的文字繪製背景。If the item being drawn is , the background is drawn with the text highlighted. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立主控描繪項目。The following example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn items. 程式碼會使用屬性，指定繪製的項目是固定的大小和事件以執行每個項目至繪圖。The code uses the property to specify that the items drawn are a fixed size and the event to perform the drawing of each item into the . 範例程式碼使用的屬性和方法的類別當做參數傳遞至事件處理常式繪製項目。The example code uses the properties and methods of the class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items. 這個範例假設控制項，名為`listBox1`已加入至表單，而且事件由範例程式碼中定義的事件處理常式。This example assumes that a control named `listBox1` was added to a form and that the event is handled by the event handler that is defined in the example code. 此範例也會假設項目已加入至含有文字的"Apple"，"梅紅 」，「 橙色 」，依此順序。The example also assumes that items were added to the with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum", in that order. [!code-csharp[ListBox.DrawMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.DrawMode/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.DrawMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.DrawMode/VB/form1.vb#1)]
